articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: Euro zone economy ekes out better-than-expected 0.1% growth in second quarter - CNBC
articles.description: Attention has focused on how tariffs may impact Europe's economies.
articles.content:
The euro zone economy eked out a better-than-expected 0.1% growth in the second quarter, compared to the previous three-month stretch, flash data from Eurostat showed Wednesday.
